exams.name: CPC Free Practice
exams.description: A practice test to prepare for the CPC certification.

exams.name: CPC Certification Exam
exams.description: This comprehensive exam tests your mastery of CPT, HCPCS Level II, and ICD-10-CM coding for physician services. Prove your readiness for the official AAPC CPC credential.

exams.name: CCA Free Practice
exams.description: A practice test for the Certified Coding Associate exam.

exams.name: CCA Certification Exam
exams.description: Demonstrate your competency in coding patient data across all settings, including hospitals and physician practices. A crucial step towards achieving your AHIMA CCA certification.

exams.name: Medical Billing Free Practice
exams.description: A practice test for medical billing concepts.

exams.name: Medical Billing Certification
exams.description: Validate your expertise in the entire medical billing process, from patient registration and claim submission to payment posting and collections. Ideal for aspiring billing specialists.

exams.name: CCS Free Practice
exams.description: Practice for the Certified Coding Specialist exam.

exams.name: CCS Certification Exam
exams.description: Showcase your advanced skills in classifying medical data from patient records, particularly in hospital settings. Prepares you for the rigorous AHIMA CCS credential.

exams.name: Risk Adjustment Free Practice
exams.description: Practice for Risk Adjustment coding proficiency.

exams.name: Risk Adjustment Certification
exams.description: Master the principles of risk adjustment coding. This exam evaluates your ability to accurately assign ICD-10-CM codes to reflect patient health status for proper reimbursement.

exams.name: ICD-10-CM Free Practice
exams.description: Practice your ICD-10-CM coding skills.

exams.name: ICD-10-CM Proficiency Exam
exams.description: An in-depth assessment of your ability to accurately use the ICD-10-CM code set for diagnosis coding across various healthcare settings. Perfect for validating your specialized skills.

exams.name: CPB Free Practice
exams.description: Practice for the Certified Professional Biller exam.

exams.name: CPB Certification Exam
exams.description: Prove your proficiency in all aspects of medical billing, including claim processing, denials management, and compliance. Aligns with the AAPC CPB certification standards.

exams.name: CRC Free Practice
exams.description: Practice for the Certified Risk Adjustment Coder exam.

exams.name: CRC Certification Exam
exams.description: This exam validates your expertise in risk adjustment (HCC) models. It tests your ability to link diagnoses to chronic conditions for accurate risk score calculation.

exams.name: CPMA Free Practice
exams.description: Practice for the Certified Professional Medical Auditor exam.

exams.name: CPMA Certification Exam
exams.description: Demonstrate your skills in medical auditing and compliance. This exam covers documentation guidelines, coding standards, and risk analysis for the AAPC CPMA credential.

exams.name: COC Free Practice
exams.description: Practice for the Certified Outpatient Coder exam.

exams.name: COC Certification Exam
exams.description: Test your knowledge of outpatient coding, including CPT, ICD-10-CM, and HCPCS Level II, as it applies to hospital outpatient departments and ambulatory surgery centers.

exams.name: CIC Free Practice
exams.description: Practice for the Certified Inpatient Coder exam.

exams.name: CIC Certification Exam
exams.description: This exam assesses your ability to assign accurate codes for diagnoses and procedures in the inpatient hospital setting, covering ICD-10-CM and ICD-10-PCS.

exams.name: Medical Terminology & Anatomy Free Practice
exams.description: Test your knowledge of medical terminology and anatomy.

exams.name: Medical Terminology & Anatomy Proficiency
exams.description: A foundational exam to certify your understanding of the medical language and human body systems that are essential for accurate coding.

exams.name: Anatomy & Physiology Free Practice
exams.description: Practice your Anatomy & Physiology knowledge.

exams.name: Anatomy & Physiology Proficiency
exams.description: Validate your comprehensive knowledge of human anatomy and physiology, a core competency for any medical coding or healthcare professional.

exams.name: E/M Coding Free Practice
exams.description: Practice your Evaluation & Management coding skills.

exams.name: Evaluation & Management Proficiency
exams.description: Demonstrate your expertise in the complex world of Evaluation and Management (E/M) coding, including the latest guidelines for office visits and other services.

exams.name: RCM Free Practice
exams.description: Practice your Revenue Cycle Management knowledge.

exams.name: Revenue Cycle Management Proficiency
exams.description: This comprehensive exam covers all stages of the healthcare revenue cycle, from patient access and charge capture to claims management and analytics.

exams.name: Health Informatics Free Practice
exams.description: Practice your Health Informatics knowledge.

exams.name: Health Informatics Proficiency
exams.description: Test your understanding of health informatics principles, including data standards, electronic health records (EHRs), and data analytics in healthcare.

exams.name: Medical Coding Fundamentals Practice
exams.description: Test your foundational medical coding knowledge.

exams.name: Medical Coding Fundamentals Proficiency
exams.description: Establish your grasp of the essential principles of medical coding. This exam covers foundational concepts that are crucial for a successful career in the field.

certificateTemplates.title: Medical Coding Proficiency
certificateTemplates.body: For successfully demonstrating proficiency in medical coding principles and practices with a final score of {finalScore}%. This certifies the holder's competence in the standards required for this certification.

certificateTemplates.title: Certified Professional Coder (CPC) Ready
certificateTemplates.body: For successfully demonstrating advanced proficiency in CPT, HCPCS Level II, and ICD-10-CM coding standards with a final score of {finalScore}%.

certificateTemplates.title: Certified Coding Associate (CCA) Ready
certificateTemplates.body: For successfully demonstrating comprehensive proficiency in patient data coding across all healthcare settings with a final score of {finalScore}%.

certificateTemplates.title: Certified Medical Billing Specialist
certificateTemplates.body: For successfully demonstrating expertise in the medical billing lifecycle, including claim submission and revenue management, with a final score of {finalScore}%.

certificateTemplates.title: Certified Coding Specialist (CCS) Ready
certificateTemplates.body: For successfully demonstrating advanced skills in classifying medical data from inpatient and outpatient records with a final score of {finalScore}%.

certificateTemplates.title: Certified Risk Adjustment Coder
certificateTemplates.body: For successfully demonstrating expertise in risk adjustment coding principles for accurate health status assessment with a final score of {finalScore}%.

certificateTemplates.title: ICD-10-CM Coding Proficiency
certificateTemplates.body: For successfully demonstrating specialized skill in the application of the ICD-10-CM code set for diagnosis coding with a final score of {finalScore}%.

certificateTemplates.title: Certified Professional Biller (CPB) Ready
certificateTemplates.body: For successfully demonstrating proficiency in all aspects of the medical billing revenue cycle with a final score of {finalScore}%.

certificateTemplates.title: Certified Risk Adjustment Coder (CRC) Ready
certificateTemplates.body: For successfully demonstrating expertise in risk adjustment (HCC) coding models and guidelines with a final score of {finalScore}%.

certificateTemplates.title: Certified Professional Medical Auditor (CPMA) Ready
certificateTemplates.body: For successfully demonstrating advanced skills in medical auditing, compliance, and documentation guidelines with a final score of {finalScore}%.

certificateTemplates.title: Certified Outpatient Coder (COC) Ready
certificateTemplates.body: For successfully demonstrating proficiency in coding for hospital outpatient departments and ambulatory surgery centers with a final score of {finalScore}%.

certificateTemplates.title: Certified Inpatient Coder (CIC) Ready
certificateTemplates.body: For successfully demonstrating expertise in inpatient hospital coding using ICD-10-CM and ICD-10-PCS with a final score of {finalScore}%.

certificateTemplates.title: Medical Terminology & Anatomy Proficiency
certificateTemplates.body: For successfully demonstrating foundational knowledge of medical terminology and human anatomy with a final score of {finalScore}%.

certificateTemplates.title: Anatomy & Physiology Proficiency
certificateTemplates.body: For successfully demonstrating comprehensive knowledge of human anatomy and physiology with a final score of {finalScore}%.

certificateTemplates.title: Evaluation & Management (E/M) Proficiency
certificateTemplates.body: For successfully demonstrating expertise in the application of E/M coding guidelines with a final score of {finalScore}%.

certificateTemplates.title: Revenue Cycle Management Proficiency
certificateTemplates.body: For successfully demonstrating a comprehensive understanding of the healthcare revenue cycle with a final score of {finalScore}%.

certificateTemplates.title: Health Informatics Proficiency
certificateTemplates.body: For successfully demonstrating a strong grasp of health informatics principles, including data standards and analytics, with a final score of {finalScore}%.

certificateTemplates.title: Medical Coding Fundamentals Proficiency
certificateTemplates.body: For successfully demonstrating foundational knowledge in medical coding principles with a final score of {finalScore}%.

suggestedBooks.title: Official CPC Certification Study Guide
suggestedBooks.description: The official study guide from AAPC, covering all aspects of the CPC exam. An essential resource for any serious candidate.

suggestedBooks.title: Step-by-Step Medical Coding
suggestedBooks.description: A comprehensive textbook that breaks down complex coding concepts into manageable steps. Perfect for beginners and CCA prep.

suggestedBooks.title: Medical Billing & Coding For Dummies
suggestedBooks.description: An approachable guide to the world of medical billing and coding, explaining the basics of the healthcare revenue cycle.

suggestedBooks.title: ICD-10-CM Expert for Physicians
suggestedBooks.description: The complete ICD-10-CM code set with guidelines, perfect for detailed study and professional use.

suggestedBooks.title: ICD-10-PCS Expert
suggestedBooks.description: The complete code set for inpatient procedural coding. An essential reference for hospital coders and CCS candidates.

suggestedBooks.title: Risk Adjustment Documentation & Coding
suggestedBooks.description: A deep dive into risk adjustment models, HCCs, and the documentation needed for accurate coding. Great for CRC prep.

suggestedBooks.title: Medical Auditing: A Step-by-Step Guide
suggestedBooks.description: Learn the principles of medical auditing, from creating a plan to reporting findings. Essential for CPMA candidates.

suggestedBooks.title: Principles of CPT Coding
suggestedBooks.description: A training and educational guide to CPT coding, perfect for understanding the nuances of outpatient services.

suggestedBooks.title: Medical Terminology For Dummies
suggestedBooks.description: A fun and easy way to master the language of medicine. This book breaks down complex terms into simple, memorable parts.

suggestedBooks.title: Anatomy & Physiology For Dummies
suggestedBooks.description: An accessible guide to the structures and functions of the human body, presented in a straightforward and easy-to-understand manner.

suggestedBooks.title: Evaluation and Management Coding Reference Guide
suggestedBooks.description: A specialized guide focusing solely on E/M coding, providing clear explanations and examples for all levels of service.

suggestedBooks.title: The Healthcare Revenue Cycle: An-Insider's-Guide
suggestedBooks.description: A comprehensive overview of the entire revenue cycle process in healthcare, from patient scheduling to final payment.

suggestedBooks.title: Health Informatics: An Interprofessional Approach
suggestedBooks.description: A leading textbook on health informatics, covering data, technology, and its application in improving healthcare delivery.
